briefTitle: Immunology and Safety of Menactra® in Children in Saudi Arabia
officialTitle: Evaluation of the Response to a Single Dose of Menactra® in Children Aged 5 to 8 Years Who Had Previously Received Two Doses of Quadrivalent (A, C, Y, W-135) Meningococcal Polysaccharide Vaccine Before Age 2 Years in Saudi Arabia

interventions.name: Menactra®: Meningococcal Polysaccharide Diphtheria Toxoid Conjugate
Menactra®: Meningococcal Polysaccharide Diphtheria Toxoid Conjugate

summary: This study will be conducted among children in Saudi Arabia who previously received two doses of A, C, Y, W-135 polysaccharide vaccine before the age of 2 years, and in meningococcal vaccine-naïve children (Control Group). This study will evaluate the administration of Menactra® in terms of the serum bactericidal antibody it induces in the two study groups. Safety of Menactra® vaccine will be described.

primaryOutcome.measure: Geometric Mean Titers (GMTs) as Measured by Serum Bactericidal Assay Using Baby Rabbit Complement (SBA-BR) Pre- and Post-Menactra® Vaccination.
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Day 0 (baseline or pre-vaccination) and Day 28 Post-vaccination
